issue.title: [Python] Expose RecordBatch.FromStructArray in Python.
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7228](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7228). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This API was introduced in ARROW-6243. It will make converting from a list of python dicts to a RecordBatch easier:

 

struct_array = pa.array([\{"column1": 1, "column2": 5}, \{"column2": 6}])

record_batch = pa.RecordBatch.from_struct_array(struct_array)
